question: "Franz Kafka Prize" is given for which one of the following fields?
explanation: Franz Kafka Prize is given in the field of literature. It is a literary award presented in honour of Franz Kafka. It was first awarded in 2001 co-sponsored by the Franz Kafka Society and the city of Prague, Czech Republic. Pierre Michon was the 2019 laureate of Franz Kafka Prize. Franz Kafka was a Czech German-speaking novelist who is widely regarded as one of the major figures of the 20th-century literature. His major works include "The Metamorphosis"; "The Trial"; "The Castle".
